LanguageData.SkyAI.CanMineMineablesDesc: Pawns will be able to use the digging skill for rocks instead of attacking them.
LanguageData.SkyAI.CanMineWallsDesc: Pawns will be able to use the digging skill for walls instead of attacking them.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ScaleRaidWidthLabel: Scale raid width by enemy raid count
LanguageData.SkyAI.ScaleRaidWidthDesc: The width of the raid depends on the number of pawns in the raid. The default raid width is 25 cells in radius.
LanguageData.SkyAI.GatherTroopsLabel: Enable leader gathers troops near colony
LanguageData.SkyAI.GatherTroopsDesc: Before the attack, the raid leader will gather troops near the player's base, so the enemy pawn have time to reach the duty point before attack.
LanguageData.SkyAI.GatherRangeDesc: How far the raid can select the gathering location from the spawn location.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinSquadDesc: The minimum number of pawns a squad should have.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MaxSquadDesc: The maximum number of squad units that can create a raid.
LanguageData.SkyAI.DestroyersExDelayDesc: Pawns with siege weapons, which for some reason cannot find a target for an attack for a long time, are included in the exclusion list and go into close combat. What is the delay to get out of the list back? Delay in the number of calls to the siege AI for a new job.
LanguageData.SkyAI.SupporterRoleDesc: The role of the support is to cover the group of attackers in the main attack area. If there are enough attackers in the zone, the pawns will tend to cover, instead of trying to attack another free (not-reserved) building.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MechSupporterRoleLabel: Enable mechanoid will use support role
LanguageData.SkyAI.DestroyerRoleDesc: Pawns with the main weapon capable of inflicting big damage on buildings are assigned to the role of destroyers.
LanguageData.SkyAI.SniperRoleDesc: Pawns with sniper weapons are assigned to the role of snipers and will try to cover and target enemies from afar.
LanguageData.SkyAI.DoctorRoleDesc: NPC squads will create field doctors.
LanguageData.SkyAI.LeaderRoleDesc: NPC raid will create raid leader.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ExtinguishFireDesc: AI will try to extinguish allies from fire.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ResqueAlliesDesc: When retreating, the AI will, if possible, evacuate the wounded and the corpses of allies.
LanguageData.SkyAI.StealingDesc: Ai will try to steal something. Not only when the raid leaves with steal duty.
LanguageData.SkyAI.LeaderCombatAuraDesc: The raid leader will have a combat aura and improve the combat capabilities of the squad around.
LanguageData.SkyAI.SquadLeaderCombatAuraDesc: The squad commanders will have a combat aura and improve the combat capabilities of the group around.
LanguageData.SkyAI.SuppressionFireDesc: Enemy gunners, snipers will try to keep on sight enemy defensive positions.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedSuppressionFireLabel: Enable enemy advanced suppression fire mode
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedSuppressionFireDesc: Enemy machine gunners, will try constantly suppress enemy defensive positions.
LanguageData.SkyAI.SquadSuppressionRatioDesc: Percentage of the squad that will be allocated to suppress enemy positions.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinDistanceGoalPositionDesc: The distance from which pawns begin to search for building targets to attack. The greater the value, the higher the burden of pathfinding.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinWeaponWeightLabel: Min. weapon weight to consider as light weapon
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinWeaponWeightDesc: If a pawn has a weapon mass greater than this value, it will not be considered for example, for the role of doctor.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinEffectiveRangeDesc: The minimum distance to be applied to calculate position selection with using pawn weapon effective range based on an enemy position.
LanguageData.SkyAI.SaveExitSpotsDesc: Improved finding an exit from the map, taking into account possible enemies on the route.
LanguageData.SkyAI.CommonExitSpotsDesc: When leaving from map, pawns will try to move in one direction.
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceNoWeaponLabel: Enable enemies to escape chance with no any weapon
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceNoWeaponDesc: Enemies with some chance may leave if have no primary weapon. Personal traits affect the chance.
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceExhaustedLabel: Enable enemies to escape chance when exhausted
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceExhaustedDesc: Pawns with some chance can leave if exhausted. Personal traits affect the chance.
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceWoundedLabel: Enable enemies to escape chance when wounded
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceWoundedDesc: Pawns with some chance can leave if wounded. Personal traits affect the chance.
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceTempInjLabel: Enable enemies to escape due to temperature injuries
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceTempInjDesc: Pawns can leave with some chance of frostbite or burns caused by the environment.
LanguageData.SkyAI.EscapeChanceMultiplierDesc: General multiplier of the effect on the chance of escape.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MainRoleIconDesc: Enable display the icon above the pawn that corresponds to the role in the group.
LanguageData.SkyAI.TraderIconDesc: Enable display the icon above the pawn that corresponds to traders.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AggroIconDesc: Enable display the icon above the pawn that corresponds to pawns with agressive mental state.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AnimalAggroIconLabel: Enable animal agro mental state icons
LanguageData.SkyAI.AnimalAggroIconDesc: Enable display the icon above the animal that corresponds to animal agressive mental state.
LanguageData.SkyAI.CatCrazyIconDesc: Enable display the icon above the pawn that corresponds to cats with crazytime pastime.
LanguageData.SkyAI.RememberOwnedThingsLabel: Pawns will remember the owned things
LanguageData.SkyAI.RememberOwnedThingsDesc: Pawns remember what equipment, cargo, weapons they have with them and will consider them as their own.
LanguageData.SkyAI.CaravansPickUpCargoLabel: Trade caravans will pick up their cargo
LanguageData.SkyAI.CaravansPickUpCargoDesc: If one of the pack animals goes down, the caravan will try to pick up the dropped goods. Requires enabled previous setting.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ReactToThreatsLabel: Non-combat pawn will react to threats
LanguageData.SkyAI.ReactToThreatsDesc: Pawns, which perform a non-combat task, may switch to defense mode if threatened.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ReactToThreatsAreaLabel: The area in which allies will react
LanguageData.SkyAI.ReactToThreatsAreaDesc: The distance from which allied pawns will be able to react on damage for allies and engage.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ActiveThreatRangeDesc: The distance from which a pawn can determine that it has been targeted.
LanguageData.SkyAI.EnchancedReactionToThreatDesc: Pawns in battle will be able to react much faster to the enemy threats, overriding the current work.
LanguageData.SkyAI.CanBreakDistanceLabel: Enable enemy with ranged weapon can break distance
LanguageData.SkyAI.CanBreakDistanceDesc: Sometimes pawns with ranged weapon may try to break the distance with an enemy.
LanguageData.SkyAI.KiteMechanicDesc: Snipers will try to keep their distance, not to let the enemy too close.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ExternalTakeEquipJobLabel: Enable external take and equip job
LanguageData.SkyAI.ExternalTakeEquipJobDesc: Adds the ability to search for weapons and ammunition nearby.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedExplosionDetectionDesc: Pawns will avoid explosions from grenades, mines, and even burning ammo.
LanguageData.SkyAI.DangerousCellsDetectionDesc: Each shot at a target creates a dangerous area between the shooter and the target. Pawns will try to avoid this area, to not taking damage.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedExplosionDetectionLabel: Colony pawns will use advanced explosion detection
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedExplosionDetectionDesc: Allow colony pawns to use improved explosion detection to grenades, explosions.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ExplosionRadiusDetectionDesc: The radius at which a pawn can detect a threat from a grenade or an explosion of ammo.
LanguageData.SkyAI.StopFiringFriendlyFireLabel: Stop firing due to friendly fire
LanguageData.SkyAI.StopFiringFriendlyFireDesc: Pawns can override the aiming and fire preparation if there is an ally in range.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AutoSwitchRangedWeaponsLabel: Auto switch to all range weapons
LanguageData.SkyAI.AutoSwitchRangedWeaponsDesc: If the number of pawns with firearms on the map is less than 60, automatically activates ~All Ranged Weapons~ friendly fire setting as a control against a possible tps decrease.
LanguageData.SkyAI.CanMissFriendlyFireLabel: Pawns with stupidity traits can miss friendly fire
LanguageData.SkyAI.CanMissFriendlyFireDesc: Pawns who have stupid character traits can intentionally miss a friendly fire check.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ChanceMissFriendlyFireDesc: Determine with what chance a pawn can miss friendly fire check.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ExtraFriendlyFireMinDistanceDesc: Extra distance to avoidFriendlyFire value, which adds up. The higher the value, the lower the chance of hitting allies with splash damage, but at the same time it makes it harder to find possible targets.
LanguageData.SkyAI.WillSwitchWeaponCombatLabel: Enemies will switch weapon during combat
LanguageData.SkyAI.WillSwitchWeaponCombatDesc: Pawns will be able to switch weapons in combat, which have in the inventory.
LanguageData.SkyAI.IncendiaryWeaponUseLabel: Enemies will use incendiary weapon check
LanguageData.SkyAI.IncendiaryWeaponUseDesc: Pawns will try to choose a target that is vulnerable to fire if possible if have a weapon with fire damage type.
LanguageData.SkyAI.InventoryUseSiegeWeaponLabel: Enemies will use inventory for siege weapon
LanguageData.SkyAI.InventoryUseSiegeWeaponDesc: Pawns will switch to siege weapons (grenades) if possible, if its necessary to blow something up.
LanguageData.SkyAI.NonLOSDangerTargetCheckDesc: Enemy pawns will try not to target areas that are not in sight, thereby reducing the chance of being caught by surprise.
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedNonLOSDangerTargetCheckLab: Enable advanced non-LOS danger target check
LanguageData.SkyAI.AdvancedNonLOSDangerTargetCheckDes: Enemy pawns will check area for doors and embrasures instead of simple enemy pawn detection behind which the enemy could potentially be.
LanguageData.SkyAI.NotAttackAnimalsLabel: Enemies will not attack non-aggressive colony animals
LanguageData.SkyAI.NotAttackAnimalsDesc: Enemy pawns will not consider the colony's animals as a target, as long as the animal is not aggressive toward them.
LanguageData.SkyAI.UnderCrossfireDesc: In some scripts, enemy pawns will check the cells for a chance to get caught in the crossfire, thus avoiding a foolish death.
LanguageData.SkyAI.InheritAlliesDutyLabel: Downed enemies after treatment inherit allies duty
LanguageData.SkyAI.InheritAlliesDutyDesc: Downed pawns, lose their initial status in the squad and leave if will be able to arise. The option adds an inheritance of the squad from the nearest doctor or other ally, thereby turning the fighter back to raid.
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformTreatmentColonyPawnsLabel: Allied doctor could perform treatment (tend job) to colony pawns
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformTreatmentColonyPawnsDesc: Allied doctor could perform treatment (tend job) to colony pawns. It may not work correctly yet, temp. disabled by default.
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformTreatmentEnemyPawnsLabel: Allied doctor could perform treatment (tend job) to colony enemy pawns
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformTreatmentEnemyPawnsDesc: Allied doctor could perform treatment (tend job) to colony enemy pawns which is friendly for their faction.
LanguageData.SkyAI.LayingOnGroundSelfTendLabel: Enable laying on ground on self tend
LanguageData.SkyAI.LayingOnGroundSelfTendDesc: Pawn will try to lie down during treatment (tend job).
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformСonsciousnessBuffLabel: Enemy doctor will add consciousness buff
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformСonsciousnessBuffDesc: Doctors will be able to add one of the possible consciousness-enhancing drugs based on faction tech.
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformTreatmentAlliesLabel: Enemy doctor perform treatment (tend job) to downed allies
LanguageData.SkyAI.PerformTreatmentAlliesDesc: Doctors will be able to perform treatment (tend job) for downed allies.
LanguageData.SkyAI.DownedAlliesScanRangeDesc: Range of detection of downed allies, as a downed pawn loses its status as a member of the squad.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinRaidSizeForLeaderLabel: Min. raid size to get leader
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinRaidSizeForLeaderDesc: What is the total number of pawns in the raid required to form a leader?
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinRaidSizeForDoctorLabel: Min. raid size to get doctor
LanguageData.SkyAI.MinRaidSizeForDoctorDesc: What is the total number of pawns in the raid required to form a doctor?
LanguageData.SkyAI.DoctorFrequencySpawnLabel: Every X raid member become field doctor
LanguageData.SkyAI.DoctorFrequencySpawnDesc: For example, a raid of 30 pawns. If every x = 10, raid will be with 3 doctors.
LanguageData.SkyAI.MedicineCountSpawnDesc: What number of medicine will be added to each doctor. The type of medicine depends on the tech. level of the faction.
LanguageData.SkyAI.RestoreToDefaultLabel: Replace saved mod settings and restore to default.
LanguageData.SkyAI.ClearDataLabel: Clear all dictionaries, lists, removes pawns from the map, as if you had updated to the new mod version.
